definitions.definition: An archipelago and overseas territory of the United Kingdom in the North Atlantic Ocean , 580 nautical miles (1074 kilometers) east-southeast of Cape Hatteras , North Carolina .

main_definition: An archipelago and overseas territory of the United Kingdom in the North Atlantic Ocean , 580 nautical miles (1074 kilometers) east-southeast of Cape Hatteras , North Carolina .

definitions.definition: A pale, slightly blue shade of green

main_definition: A pale, slightly blue shade of green
